forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 11am and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. South southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. South wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 8am, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.
